text: and all these curses shall come upon thee, and shall pursue and overtake thee, till thou perish, because thou heards not the voice of the Lord thy God, and didst not keep his commandments and ceremonies which he commanded.

segments.text: and all these curses shall come upon thee, and shall pursue and overtake thee, till thou perish,
because thou heards not the voice of the Lord thy God, and didst not keep his commandments
